name: Block Breaker (Swordy)
description:
A game I created while following a course online. It's a very simple version of any old Block Breaker game. The slight twist is that the paddle is curved upwards! Ooooooo!

10 levels worth, the ball speeds up as you go along and you only have 1 life. Good luck and see how far you can get!

Controls:

  • Click to start the ball
  • Move the mouse to move the paddle

Note: There is a button in the top left corner of the screen (little white dot) that will auto-move the paddle for you, if you would just like to see the different levels, or if you're having too much difficulty with a level. Note, it simply goes where the ball is, so it might take a while for it to finish the level.
